about_the_game:
This is an open-world story about VAN CAT (that's his name, no affiliations with vehicles), a duduk player from a regular family, who tracks down his CULT-LEADING UNCLE through spacetime to talk him out of creating a WORLDWIDE DICTATORSHIP!!!

Explore three surreal, immersive worlds swirling with music, light and color, inspired by the Ottoman Empire, Soviet Armenia and modern day Armenia to rescue your best friend, talk some sense to your weird, weird uncle, and destroy his time machine.

This Game Includes:
  • Unique visuals by the developer herself
  • Beautiful music
  • Sunlight and other cute lighting to make it feel like you're actually outside and touching grass
  • Battling mechanics
  • Puzzle solving, using pattern recognition to unlock doors and find hidden keys...
  • Open world exploration, I don't want to control you :D
detailed_description:
This is an open-world story about VAN CAT (that's his name, no affiliations with vehicles), a duduk player from a regular family, who tracks down his CULT-LEADING UNCLE through spacetime to talk him out of creating a WORLDWIDE DICTATORSHIP!!!

Explore three surreal, immersive worlds swirling with music, light and color, inspired by the Ottoman Empire, Soviet Armenia and modern day Armenia to rescue your best friend, talk some sense to your weird, weird uncle, and destroy his time machine.

This Game Includes:
  • Unique visuals by the developer herself
  • Beautiful music
  • Sunlight and other cute lighting to make it feel like you're actually outside and touching grass
  • Battling mechanics
  • Puzzle solving, using pattern recognition to unlock doors and find hidden keys...
  • Open world exploration, I don't want to control you :D

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 1550 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting back-end requires Xcode. Targeting Apple Silicon with IL2CPP scripting back-end requires macOS Catalina 10.15.4 and Xcode 12.2 or newer.

name: Vanakatu

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) , Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1530 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting back-end requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10 SDK.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A surreal story-driven game that uses puzzle-solving, turn based battling, and open world navigation to help Van Cat track down his evil uncle and put an end to his nefarious plans!
